/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the lush greenery lining the sides of the road. Trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

On the right side of the road, there are several buildings, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterize Beijing. On the left side, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, a testament to the city's infrastructure.

The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and movement, characteristic of a busy city street.
